content: a stunning crescent shawl that will positively fly off your needles somehow this shawl manages to be light and airy despite being knit with bulky yarn and it is oh-so-soft and squishy as soon as i saw this yarn with its exquisite gradient color changes i just had to have it best of all this shawl only requires one cake of yarn and finishing is a breeze since there are only two tails to weave in for the whole project watch a video tutorial **here** 1 shawl begins at top center and is worked outward toward bottom edge making it easy to adjust for the size you want want a smaller shawl knit less row larger keep knitting yarn caron colorama halo 71% acrylic 18% nylon 11% polyester 481yds/227g blue raspberry qty 1 or approx 480 yards bulky weight yarn of similar composition needle us 11 8 mm 40 or longer circular needle 1 https //youtu be/2nq5rsr6bam
